email_chain.subject: Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Sophia,

I hope this message finds you well. We are looking to ship 75,000MT of coal from Richards Bay to Qingdao under CIF terms. Could you please provide a suitable vessel and a freight quote?

Best regards,
Lucas Martin

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for your inquiry. We can offer the vessel OCEAN TRADER for this shipment. The vessel has a DWT of 82,000 and an LOA of 225m. The laycan is 25-30 September. Our starting freight quote is USD 25/MT on a CIF basis.

Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Sophia Lee

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Sophia,

Thank you for the prompt response. USD 25/MT seems a bit high compared to market rates. Could you consider lowering the rate to USD 22/MT? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate and laycan flexibility?

Looking forward to your reply.

Best regards,
Lucas Martin

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Qingdao - Revised Offer
email_chain.body:
Lucas,

Thank you for your feedback. We can revise the freight quote to USD 23/MT. The demurrage rate is USD 15,000 per day, and the laycan remains 25-30 September. Please confirm if this meets your requirements.

Best regards,
Sophia Lee

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Qingdao - Final Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Sophia,

USD 23/MT is acceptable. Please confirm the details, and let's proceed with the booking. We will handle the insurance and other CIF-related arrangements.

Best regards,
Lucas Martin

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Qingdao - Booking Confirmed
email_chain.body:
Lucas,

Thank you for your confirmation. The booking is now confirmed for the OCEAN TRADER with a freight rate of USD 23/MT. The laycan is 25-30 September, and the demurrage rate is USD 15,000 per day. Please find the booking confirmation attached.

Best regards,
Sophia Lee
